subject: African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sudan reached the quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations for the first time in 42 years, defeating Burkina Faso, 2-1, in Bata, Equatorial Guinea, to beat out Angola on goal difference.
snippet: Sudan reached the quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations for the first time in 42 years, defeating Burkina Faso, 2-1, in Bata, Equatorial Guinea, to beat out Angola on goal difference.
